name: Stay Awake - Keep Your Screen Awake
description: Tired of screen sleep during presentations or reads? StayAwake keeps your display ON for uninterrupted focus. Official extension.
author: Pranav Arya (https://pranavarya.in)

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com;
